title: A-02 Facepak
summary: A-02 Facepak for Face for Wear by JR Designs
description: Aviation inspired design featuring classic aviator hands, oversized 9 and a power saving "ambient" mode.This face supports Face's custom backgrounds and hue settings. To modify these settings click Edit in Face.**********THIS APP NEEDS THE APP "FACE", NOT "FACER" (Read below)To use, Download this, and apply the watchface through the app:http://goo.gl/qRCR7RJoin the community too:http://goo.gl/EDGkmBIf you still have trouble, please contact me.
descriptionHTML:
Aviation inspired design featuring classic aviator hands, oversized 9 and a power saving "ambient" mode.

This face supports Face's custom backgrounds and hue settings. To modify these settings click Edit in Face.

**********THIS APP NEEDS THE APP "FACE", NOT "FACER" (Read below)
To use, Download this, and apply the watchface through the app:
http://goo.gl/qRCR7R

Join the community too:
http://goo.gl/EDGkmB

If you still have trouble, please contact me.
comments: Quality! Finally, a design that considers simplicity and a variety of watches instead of being a designer clone. One of my new favorites!
recentChanges: Updated to use the new Theme Template which includes a Launcher Icon which can be hidden.
